Technical Chart (Daily - 6 Months)
Updated: 2020/08/25 16:08
(1) All quotes for Hong Kong stocks Bid, Ask, Block Traded, Most Active Price, Industry Top 5, ADR, Most Active Warrants and CBBCs are at least 15 minutes delayed.
(2) Hone Kong dollar against the RMB today: 0.892
(3) The USD against Hong Kong dollar today: 7.752
(4) SSE Composite Index is delayed for at least 15 minutes.
(5) Price to Earnings Ratio is computed by last price and earning per share.
(6) TTM Price to Earnings Ratio is computed by last price and TTM earning per share.
(7) Yield is computed by last price and dividend per share.
(8) TTM Yield is computed by last price and TTM dividend per share.
(9) Price to Book ratio is computed by last price and net asset value per share
(10) Short Sell Turn. /Ratio (%): N/A
(11) Money Flow, Recent Statistic and Technical Analysis are updated every 2 minutes during trading hours
(12) Historical Range data is up to last trading day.
(13) Historical Performance are computed by last price and historical price of the corresponding period
